overview: Ryan Kenward is the Site Architect of Vagary.TV. From its original conception in 2005, he has grown the site into a tight knit community that continues to grow its presence in the gamer community. Vagary.TV is a podcast network with a focus on gaming that presents a unique perspective into the industry from the perspective of an average person. 2010 has been a big year for Vagary.TV, several new shows have been added, the site is now a recognized media organization within the industry attending PAX East and E3 as media. Ryan continues to work on expanding the scope of the site and aims to grow the user base and awareness of the site.
